thread.title: New Mexico Official Pleads Guilty to Embezzlement
thread.title_full: New Mexico Official Pleads Guilty to Embezzlement

author: Taegan Goddard
title: New Mexico Official Pleads Guilty to Embezzlement
text:
New Mexico Official Pleads Guilty to Embezzlement October 23, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
New Mexico Secretary of State Dianna Duran (R) “pleaded guilty to embezzlement and other charges Friday after abruptly resigning amid a fraud investigation that alleged she siphoned thousands of dollars from her election account to help fuel her gambling addiction,” the AP reports.
